name: JEWELS!
description:
First fix! Fixed a small issue that displayed both endings at once (there's more than one ending!), and amended some small formatting problems.

A short Twine game about stealing jewels.

This is the first reasonably sized project I've made in Twine, and I'd love to get any kind of feedback on this Google Form:

https://goo.gl/forms/XKZ7mOmjJu0Mue3E3
